description: TYPO3 v11 Legacy Source Installation - Extensions ONLY in typo3conf/ext directory

legacy_news.reason: Should find legacy_news in typo3conf/ext directory

legacy_powermail.reason: Should find legacy_powermail in typo3conf/ext directory

custom_extension.reason: Should find custom_extension in typo3conf/ext directory

notes: Extensions are managed through Extension Manager and located in typo3conf/ext
No vendor directory - all extensions are local installations
